text:
Steyr is a city in the Austrian state of Upper Austria. It is the capital, though not part of Steyr-Land District. Steyr is Austria's 12th most populated city and the third largest city in Upper Austria. As of 1 January 2019, it has about 38,100 people living there.
The city is in the Traunviertel region, with the two rivers Steyr and Enns flowing through it.
